name: Gno.land
intro: layer1 smart contract platform invented by co-founder of Cosmos
introduce: Gno.land is a layer1 smart contract platform invented by Jae Kwon, co-founder of Cosmos and Tendermint, to address multiple issues in the blockchain space — in particular, the ease of use and intuitiveness of smart contract programming platforms. GNO Land aims to take full advantage of the capabilities of multi-core processors to create a network capable of hosting multithreaded smart contracts, where it will be possible to process thousands of contracts in parallel by optimizing the consensus process between validators.
